summary: mm/slab_common: fix possible double free of kmem_cache
details:
mm/slab_common: fix possible double free of kmem_cache

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit d71608a877362becdc94191f190902fac1e64d35, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 0495e337b7039191dfce6e03f5f830454b1fae6b. For more details please see the references link.
